description: To perform the fit up of the Elizabeth Park School. Work is to be completed within 52 weeks after contract award.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Elizabeth Park School Fit-Up

**Tender Reference Number**: WS4241887155-Doc4310626719
**Publication Date**: November 16, 2023
**Closing Date**: January 23, 2024 (14:00 EST)
**Modification Date**: January 12, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date**: December 22, 2024

**Project Overview**
This tender announcement is for the Elizabeth Park School Fit-Up project, which requires the construction and facility maintenance services of the building. The project involves the completion of 52 weeks of work after contract award.

**Procurement Details**
* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason:** N/A

**Tender Description**
The project requires the construction and fit-up of the Elizabeth Park School, including industrial security requirements. The bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and their bid by January 11, 2024, at 14:00 EST. A site visit will be held on November 28, 2023, at 10:00 am.

**Key Contact Information**

* Name: Gabrielle Jolicoeur (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her)
* Email: [gabe lle.jolicoeur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabrielle.jolicoeur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

**Notice URL**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18018146?extsite=MTgwMTgxNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The notice URL is in English and French.

**Regions of Opportunity**
None

**Regions of Delivery**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contacting Entity**
* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Supporting Trade Agreements**
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Expected Tender Status**
Expired (Note: This tender was closed on January 23, 2024, at 14:00
